Question
========

About 11% of people in the Netherlands aged 17 to 23 years are early school leavers. If you randomly choose five people from this age group then random variable X: the number of early school leavers. What is then the probability of P(X = 3)?

Answerlist
----------

* 0,001
* 0,011
* 0,550
* 0,890

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.001: Incorrect
* 0.011: Correct
* 0.550: Incorrect
* 0.890: Incorrect
